attributes.action: allow this petition to go ahead, failure will be see as Dictatorship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The english want our country back, we want immigration stopped, illegals kicked out, a life for a life tarrif, lower taxes, bring our soldiers home, close borders, give us a referemdum on EU treaty, stop Brussels interfering with our heritage, these are just some of the questions that require answers, but the more people that sign, the more chance we have..
This country will go bust within 7 years if the English are sidelined for the EU. Also crime will go up, fuel starvation will create an era of death amongst the elderly. This petition is very important,it will allow the public to say yes or no...
If you agree with the above, please sign this petition.

God save the Queen..

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
